SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jcatapult.mvc.action.result.annotation
Annotation Type Redirect

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Redirect

This annotation marks a result from an action as a redirect.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Required Element Summary
 String uri
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 String code
           
 boolean perm
           
 

Element Detail

uri

public abstract String uri
Returns:
The redirect URI.

code

public abstract String code
Returns:
The result code from the action's execute method that this Result is associated with.
Default:
"success"

perm

public abstract boolean perm
Returns:
Whether or not this is a permenant redirect (301) or a temporary redirect (302).
Default:
false
